comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content: Wingtip damage to P-47C serial 41-6585 (coded YJ-N) assigned to the 351st Fighter Squadron, 353rd FG at Metfield on 7 September 1943. LT Venron A. Leatherman walked away from the belly-landing; the aircraft was repaired and transferred to the 552nd Fighter Training Squadron.
